summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; increasing an expenditure allowance in the 1979 Budget of the Engineering Department for the Airport Way South Viaduct over Argo Railroad Yards Project lying between S. Edmunds St. and S. Lucile St.; and, authorizing The City of Seattle to accept financial assistance from the State of Washington Department of Transportation and from Burlington Northern, Inc., and the Oregon-Washington Railroad and Navigation Company and its lessee, the Union Pacific Railroad Company therefor.
